titleStmt.title: John Cox to James F. Robinson
CWG1234

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1862-1863

body.p: Kenton County K.y. August the 20 Governoer Roberson ser after my respects I hold the authere^ty^ in my hands the authorety to ras a regiment no 32 infen^t^ry and I shal expect a comision from your hands when rased for a Cornels Comession I have filed evry ofice from firs sargent to the ofice of Brigadeer general and was alected to that ofece Aaugus 1862 yours truly John Cox
